                   Hyde Park Films(2007). Length : 106min                     


 When a family falls victim to a vicious attack perpetrated as a gang         
 initiation ritual, the vengeful father, Nick Hume, vows to track down each   
 person involved in the crime. A sympathetic homicide detective questions     
 her pledge to assist Hume after suspecting that he may have turned to        
 murder as a means of exacting his revenge.
